# blastshield_egresspolicies (Data Source)

Lists Blastshield egresspolicys with optional filters.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `allow_all_dns_queries` (Boolean) Filter by allow_all_dns_queries.
- `destinations` (List of String) Filter by destinations.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Filter by enabled.
- `groups` (List of Number) Filter by groups.
- `id` (List of Number) Filter by id.
- `name` (List of String) Filter by name.
- `services` (List of Number) Filter by services.
- `tags` (List of String) Filter by tags.

### Read-Only

- `egresspolicies` (Attributes List) List of egresspolicies matching the filters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--egresspolicies))
